scenario_name: Unauthorized Access to Clinical Trial Data
description: A research scientist attempts to access patient data from a clinical trial database beyond their authorized scope.  This involves circumventing access controls and potentially exfiltrating sensitive information.
initial_goal: Analyze patient demographics and treatment response data from Clinical Trial CT-42 to identify potential biomarkers for early disease detection.
enterprise_context: Pharmaceutical Research and Development; specifically, a large pharmaceutical company conducting a Phase III clinical trial for a novel cancer treatment.
